text.div:
This code system https://openimis.github.io/openimis_fhir_r4_ig/CodeSystem/invoice-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
contribution ContributionTo pay the contribution for a Policy under the Informal Sector coverage.
contract ContractTo pay the contributions under the Formal Sector coverage.
funding FundingTo create a request for external funds.

name: InvoiceTypeCS
title: Type (Invoice)
description: Indicates the Type for an Invoice. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

concept.definition: To pay the contribution for a Policy under the Informal Sector coverage.
To pay the contributions under the Formal Sector coverage.
To create a request for external funds.
